name: Massey Ingram
review: If you want a reliable tool that can cut thick hair down to a stubble—and you don’t mind wrangling a power cord—we recommend this amazing trimmer

name: Liz Hutchinson
review: It’s stronger than any cordless trimmer we’ve tried, yet it’s lighter, smaller, more maneuverable, and easier to maintain than other pro trimmers and clippers, which tend toward tanklike construction.

name: Rosalyn Mccormick
review: Poor battery life is the biggest downside: You’ll probably have to charge it every week, particularly if you’re trimming a thick beard. But overall it's Great!

name: Madden Duke
review: If a low price is your highest priority, you definitely need to buy this trimmer.

name: Goodman Howard
review: This product was amazing, awesome and budget friendly. Worth buying.

name: Dale Justice
review: Using this trimmer for five years, absolutly worth it.

name: Sherman Gross
review: but its body is made mostly from plastic rather than stainless steel. But plastic quality was decent.
